name: Yemoja🦋a beach🦋
tweet: Buhari doesn't need to speak to us always. I think he addressed us some days ago? Why are you guys disturbing this man's quiet life with this hashtag? #WhereIsBuhari

tweet: I'm so glad the buhari challenge is trending...  very foolish people

tweet: Adams Oshiomole taking a picture of Parosident Buhari on seat earlier today at Aso Rock. #BuhariChallenge #WhereIsBuhari  https://t.co/xuiZjDIfkC

name: BE💧 🇳🇬🇨🇦
tweet: Here in Nigeria, we're all wishing our @NGRPresident @MBuhari is at the forefront of this #COVID19Nigeria issue. Guy, una President dey try abeg. Or would you mind we swap Presidents? You guys take Buhari while we take Trump 😂. Deal or No Deal?

name: NWANNE HENRY
tweet: Na who collect Buhari iphone 📱??

name: Frank Opara
tweet: Buhari is such a selfish & wicked man!  He knew very much he was not prepared for this job, but self obsession prevailed   How can he cowardly retreat at this time?  What manner of leader becomes so secretive and goes AWOL at the time he's needed most?

name: DJ THRILLER 🇳🇬
tweet: Buhari is reportedly sick. Osinbajo in self isolation Abba Kyari in ICU We need president in Nigeria! #WhereisBuhari

name: Lekchild 👑
tweet: @NGRPresident @MBuhari Maybe Buhari don turn to Zombie. Even Zombie dey move body. Lies may run for 100yrs but one day is one day, the truth will overtake. Keep on deceiving your generations with fake pictures. Trump being coming out life doing press conference, but @MBuhari NO WAY

tweet: Can we hold Buhari to same standards now?

name: #SARSMUSTEND
tweet: The truth is Buhari tested positive to Covid 19 virus. Because there is no way the man will be well and won’t address his citizens. If u are still defending this man shame on you. I said what I said

name: FWTP 🍑
tweet: I know most of it is garbage until proven otherwise but after reading Buhari's tweet (most likely not him), I was slightly relieved. Sometimes it just good to know we are all fighting this . Even the corrupt government (hopefully).

name: Alhaji Ògògó 🇳🇬
tweet: One thing is certain, the Buhari administration engages people based on the reactions on Twitter. Thank God for twitter

tweet: I feel like Buhari logs into Twitter to see what he has “said” in his tweets, for the sole purpose of staying informed and keeping up to date with our beloved country’s activities.

tweet: BUHARI IS THE WORST PRESIDENT EVER ELECTED.

tweet: Can anyone make this thing make sense? I thought Buhari is negative to the COVID-19 virus. Why would the EAC be going on self-isolation? Not making sense, honestly.

name: adishi
tweet: There's a serious effort by the Gen. Buhari media team to convince Nigerians and make us forcefully believe their silence. Evident by the way all his media aides are everywhere on social media trying hard to give an excuse for oga's stillness.

name: Engr Usman Baffa Nasir
tweet: In 3 years between 2016 and 2018, Buhari's govt budgeted a total of N5.2 billion for Aso Villa Clinic.  (2016 = N3.87b, 2017 = N331.7m, 2018 = N1.03b).  Ventilators cost between $25k to $50k, there's only 2 in Gwagwalada, but none of this in state house.......
